summary:
It summoned Camera MAN and Red lamp MAN.
They're two characters from a popular series of Japanese anti-piracy commericals.
Camera-Man = Pirate, Red Lamp Man = Law
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]It summoned Camera otoko and Red lamp otoko.
They're two characters from a popular series of Japanese anti-piracy commericals.
Camera-Man = Pirate, Red Lamp Man = Law

The books can be bought from these Belethor's General Goods in Whiterun.
Their Helmets is made in the forge, in the section "Dwarven".


caution !!
Camera man betray you.
